quotes.name: Drop description
quotes.quote: Brooklyn-class Light Cruiser – Honolulu, Hull Number CL-48!

quotes.name: Details
quotes.quote: I'm Honolulu of the Brooklyn-class. I've basically only ever served in the Pacific. I was damaged pretty bad once, but somehow I managed to make it... At least I was luckier than Helena...

quotes.name: Receive
quotes.quote: Brooklyn-class, Honolulu, reporting in. Hey, listen... could you stop staring at me like that? It's not like they're this big because I wanted them to be...

quotes.name: Log in
quotes.quote: Why do I have to wait for you here...

quotes.name: View details
quotes.quote: Maintenance? Fine, as long as you don't do anything weird...

quotes.name: Main screen 1
quotes.quote: I don't seem very Hawaiian even though my name is Honolulu? Well gee, my bad...

quotes.name: Main screen 2
quotes.quote: Helena's always acting so gloomy... You should think of ways to make her smile too, Commander.

quotes.name: Main screen 3
quotes.quote: I was born with this personality. I don't hate you or anything like that...

quotes.name: Normal touch
quotes.quote: Do you just go around touching everyone you see? Do you need anything?

quotes.name: Special touch
quotes.quote: *Sigh*... If you're gonna be this direct then I don't even feel like getting mad at you...

quotes.name: Mission reminder
quotes.quote: If you have the time to stare at me, how about you go finish your remaining missions?

quotes.name: Mission complete
quotes.quote: What, you don't even want your rewards?

quotes.name: Mail reminder
quotes.quote: Here, mail for you. What? I can at least do something this simple for you...

quotes.name: Return to port
quotes.quote: Good work. What, are you not satisfied until I say something mean?

quotes.name: Commission complete
quotes.quote: What are you waiting for... A commission's been completed!

quotes.name: Enhancing complete
quotes.quote: I didn't really ask you for this...

quotes.name: Flagship fight
quotes.quote: All I need to do is get rid of these guys, right?

quotes.name: Victory
quotes.quote: Is that enough for you?

quotes.name: Defeat
quotes.quote: I don't want to go to Mare Island again...

quotes.name: Skills
quotes.quote: This time things should go well...!

quotes.name: Upset
quotes.quote: So that's who you are, huh, Commander?

quotes.name: Stranger
quotes.quote: Do I really need to chat with you...? But I guess I don't have anything else to do, so I'll keep you company for a while.

quotes.name: Friendly
quotes.quote: I think people are jealous of me because mine are bigger than theirs… But personally I wish they were smaller. When they're big, you know, it's pretty inconvenient...

quotes.name: Crush
quotes.quote: I don't really have anything going for me outside of my body, but you're still being so nice to me... Do you like my body THAT much? Even if you don't, it's not like I... No, I'll stop myself right there, because otherwise you'll just get carried away.

quotes.name: Love
quotes.quote: ... Didn't I tell you they're not this big just because I wanted them to be? Well, if you like them that much... then maybe they're not so bad...

quotes.name: Promise
quotes.quote: This is really embarrassing, so could we just get this over with... Y-you can do whatever you want when it's just the two of us...

quotes.name: Drop description
quotes.quote: If everyone's focusing on the teacher, they probably won't stare at me from up front... As for the umbrella, it's... I know it makes me stand out, but I don't want people to stare at me from behind either...

quotes.name: Receive
quotes.quote: If everyone's focusing on the teacher, they probably won't stare at me from up front... As for the umbrella, it's... I know it makes me stand out, but I don't want people to stare at me from behind either...

quotes.name: View details
quotes.quote: Y-you want to eat lunch together? Really? I bet you're just teasing me. Or are you... just hoping to get a taste of Helena's cooking?

quotes.name: Main screen 1
quotes.quote: I made a friend at school. He's brown, cuddly, and doesn't say a word, though...

quotes.name: Main screen 2
quotes.quote: There's nobody who's like you at school. Nobody who sometimes makes me laugh, sometimes makes me cry, and sometimes... Gosh, what am I saying...

quotes.name: Normal touch
quotes.quote: It's small, but it's the only umbrella I could find. S-so, when 2 people are sharing it... i-it's only natural they'd have to stand so close together...

quotes.name: Special touch
quotes.quote: I-I don't have anything going for me besides my bust anyway...

quotes.name: Return to port
quotes.quote: Don't say you'll "see me after school"... O-or else I'll just stay behind...

quotes.name: Drop description
quotes.quote: Aaaahh! My sundae! What's up with this stupid hose?! Commander, don't just stand there, help me!

quotes.name: Receive
quotes.quote: Aaaahh! My sundae! What's up with this stupid hose?! Commander, don't just stand there, help me!

quotes.name: View details
quotes.quote: Commander, you're the one who messed with my cannons, didn't you? A-admit it! Admit it while you still have the chance...

quotes.name: Main screen 1
quotes.quote: *Gasp*! Where the heck is all this water coming from?!

quotes.name: Main screen 2
quotes.quote: Commander, you don't sound convincing at all when you tell me my swimsuit is cute while you're laughing!

quotes.name: Main screen 3
quotes.quote: *Sob*... Everyone's going to laugh at me...

quotes.name: Normal touch
quotes.quote: You called over Helena?! This is NOT the way I want to make her laugh!

quotes.name: Special touch
quotes.quote: How could you, Commander... I'll hose you till you're as soaked as I am!

quotes.name: Return to port
quotes.quote: C-Commander, umm, do you wanna take a cold shower...?

quotes.name: Flagship fight
quotes.quote: If I get rid of everyone who saw me... then I won't have anything to be embarrassed about!

quotes.name: Victory
quotes.quote: Today was your unlucky day... because I'm in a REALLY bad mood!

quotes.name: Drop description
quotes.quote: Stupid Louis... "If you dress up as a reindeer for Christmas, you'll have an easy time talking to Helena"... You think I'm stupid enough to believe that...?! *Eeeeeek*?! C-Commander?! Get out, right now!

quotes.name: Receive
quotes.quote: Stupid Louis... "If you dress up as a reindeer for Christmas, you'll have an easier time talking to Helena"... You think I'm stupid enough to believe someth...? *Eeeeeek*?! C-Commander?! Get out, right now!

quotes.name: Log in
quotes.quote: C-Commander! You did that on purpose, didn't you?!

quotes.name: View details
quotes.quote: "Special Christmas lingerie"... I never should've listened to Louis! I need to put on this whole costume quick, before someone sees me...!

quotes.name: Main screen 1
quotes.quote: *Sigh*... Just thinking about that idiot standing behind me with a straight face makes all my motivation go away...

quotes.name: Main screen 2
quotes.quote: I-I tripped just a moment ago, and these ribbons got all tangled up around me... Ahahaha, I'm such a klutz... What are the ribbons for...? U-uhh...

quotes.name: Main screen 3
quotes.quote: That's a wonderful Christmas tree...? T-thanks... Hey, hold on, don't you have anything else to say?!

quotes.name: Normal touch
quotes.quote: My plans for Christmas? Um, let's see... Hey, hold on, why are you asking that with a straight face to someone who's dressed like this?!

quotes.name: Special touch
quotes.quote: *Eek*?! Commander, when did you get here...?!

quotes.name: Mail reminder
quotes.quote: Your mail? Oh no... I forgot which box I put it in...

quotes.name: Return to port
quotes.quote: Commander?! You sure chose an awfully convenient time to come back!

quotes.name: Defeat
quotes.quote: They're staring at me... They're staring at me...!

quotes.name: Love
quotes.quote: *Sigh*... "Go visit the Commander and say 'I'm your present~!'"... That's ridiculous, the Commander would never like this stupid costu... D-did you just hear that?!

quotes.name: Drop description
quotes.quote: Come on, Louis, the goldfish stall is this way! ... W-why are you giving me that weird look like th– Wait... Eeeek! C-Commander?! When did you get here?!

quotes.name: Receive
quotes.quote: Come on, Louis, the goldfish stall is this way! ... W-why are you giving me that weird look like th– Wait... Eeeek! C-Commander?! When did you get here?!

quotes.name: Log in
quotes.quote: I'll say this now: I don't like festivals in any... Ah, you know what, never mind! Just come with me, okay?!

quotes.name: View details
quotes.quote: Wh-what are you staring at me for... Is it weird to have fun at a festival now...?

quotes.name: Main screen 1
quotes.quote: Stupid Louis... She just went "I'd rather not be kicked by a horse" and walked off... Let's just forget about her... Commander, do you want... some fried squid?

quotes.name: Main screen 2
quotes.quote: Y-you saw how flustered I was just now, didn't you... I don't hate you or anything like that, you know...

quotes.name: Main screen 3
quotes.quote: Goldfish scooping is pretty hard... Could you lend me a hand, Commander? I want one to give to Helena...!

quotes.name: Normal touch
quotes.quote: Seems there'll be a fireworks display by the harbor... Commander, how about we go there on our walk?

quotes.name: Special touch
quotes.quote: Don't make excuses... I know you did that on purpose...!

quotes.name: Return to port
quotes.quote: Do you want this...? Here, take it...

quotes.name: Flagship fight
quotes.quote: Let's get this over with quick, I wanna go back to the festival...!

quotes.name: Victory
quotes.quote: Can we go back now, Commander?

quotes.name: Defeat
quotes.quote: After all that trouble putting this on... This sucks...

quotes.name: Love
quotes.quote: *Sigh*, why can't I ever keep my composure in front of you... "What am I murmuring about"...? N-nothing! I didn't say a word...! Dummy...!

quotes.name: Battle 1
quotes.quote: (1 of the following: USS St.Louis) Louis... if you make me look dumb again then I really will get mad...

quotes.name: Battle 2
quotes.quote: (1 of the following: USS Helena) Rest easy, Helena! I'll assist you!
